00026 // lbann_callback_imcomm .hpp .cpp - Send gradient updates between models
00028 
00029 #ifndef LBANN_CALLBACKS_CALLBACK_IMCOMM_HPP_INCLUDED
00030 #define LBANN_CALLBACKS_CALLBACK_IMCOMM_HPP_INCLUDED
00031 
00032 #include <vector>
00033 #include <unordered_set>
00034 #include <unordered_map>
00035 #include "lbann/callbacks/lbann_callback.hpp"
00036 #include "lbann/utils/lbann_quantizer.hpp"
00037 
00038 namespace lbann {
00039 
00046 class lbann_callback_imcomm : public lbann_callback {
00047 public:
00048   enum comm_type {
00049     NONE,  
00050     NORMAL,  
00051     ONEBIT_QUANTIZATION,  
00052     THRESH_QUANTIZATION,  
00053     COMPRESSED_THRESH_QUANTIZATION,  
00054     ADAPTIVE_THRESH_QUANTIZATION,  
00055     COMPRESSED_ADAPTIVE_THRESH_QUANTIZATION,  
00056   };
00058   lbann_callback_imcomm(comm_type ct = NONE, lbann_summary* _summarizer = nullptr);
00063   lbann_callback_imcomm(comm_type ct, std::unordered_set<uint> _layers,
00064                         lbann_summary* _summarizer = nullptr);
00066   void setup(model* m);
00068   void on_epoch_end(model* m);
00070   void on_backward_prop_end(model* m);
00071 private:
00073   comm_type ct;
00075   lbann_quantizer quantizer;
00077   std::unordered_map<uint, Mat> quantization_errors;
00079   std::unordered_map<uint, Mat> im_quantization_errors;
00081   std::unordered_map<uint, Mat> gradhistories;
00083   std::unordered_set<uint> layer_indices;
00084 
00086   inline bool ct_does_quantization() const {
00087     return (ct == ONEBIT_QUANTIZATION ||
00088             ct == THRESH_QUANTIZATION ||
00089             ct == COMPRESSED_THRESH_QUANTIZATION ||
00090             ct == ADAPTIVE_THRESH_QUANTIZATION ||
00091             ct == COMPRESSED_ADAPTIVE_THRESH_QUANTIZATION);
00092   }
00093 };
00094 
00095 }  // namespace lbann

00097 #endif  // LBANN_CALLBACKS_CALLBACK_IMCOMM_HPP_INCLUDED
